project.description: - jbullet.jar from http://jmonkeyengine.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/engine/lib/jbullet/jbullet.jar - there is currently no jbullet maven artifact available - latest version 20101010 from http://jbullet.advel.cz/ is to old for jmonkey - i guess there is some new code in jmonkey's jbullet.jar - http://code.google.com/p/jbullet-jme/source/browse/branches/jbullet/
